author: Caio L.

text:
This Spanish-themed music seems like a really cool alternative to the usual arabian-themed desert music, although I love them too.

If you haven't played it SupraDarky I'd recommend the White Knight Chronicles soundtrack, especially the Greede theme, which is quite possibly my favourite song ever, let alone favourite video game song.
author: EresirThe1st

text:
I'm really starting to enjoy this soundtrack as well, especially now that you've introduced me to this awesome piece! ^^
If I was an MMO player, I would totally check this game out, but I will settle in buying Ragnarok Odyssey instead.
author: Medal Melodies

text: I love how soothing this song is for a Desert Theme.  I was pleasantly surprised by this track.
author: Eric C.

text: One of my favorite themes in a soundtrack full of quality music. The mix of the guitar and the pad starting at 1:21 backed by a great beat is quite addictive. I tend to really like video game music made by Japanese composers, but while I haven't listened to a lot of soundtracks composed by Korean musicians, they've rarely disappointed me.
author: SupraDarky
